import React from "react"; import "./Content.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Content = () => { function updateClock() { let now = new Date(); now.setTime(now.getTime() + 9 * 60 * 60 * 1000); // Waktu Papua adalah 9 jam lebih lambat dari UTC let hours = now.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0'); let minutes = now.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0'); let seconds = now.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2, '0'); document.getElementById('clock').innerHTML = `${hours}:${minutes}:${seconds}`; } setInterval(updateClock, 1000); updateClock(); return (
